name: Annihilation
overview: A game made by Graham Humphrey and Mihcael, Marco Pedrana and Jason Hill as the team named Underground Arcade. It was written in Blitz BASIC, mostly finished in 2016 and released as Public Domain. A horizontally scrolling space shooter of the usual sort with power-ups, waves of enemies, end-of-level bosses… you name it! It feature seven (count ‘em) themed levels: space, a strange alien forest, a strange alien desert, arctic, a ruined city (and not a strange alien in sight), a volcano and finally, the base (a strange alien one, naturally).
